subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In Brandon Webb, Mike Pelfrey sees what he aspires to become. But Pelfrey had trouble from the outset against Webb and the Diamondbacks on Saturday, and the Mets lost for his third straight start.
snippet: In Brandon Webb, Mike Pelfrey sees what he aspires to become. But Pelfrey had trouble from the outset against Webb and the Diamondbacks on Saturday, and the Mets lost for his third straight start.
